properties.name: docker.client.type
properties.description: The underlying REST client factory to be used for talking to Docker API. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: docker.client.read-timeout
properties.description: Socket read timeout for REST API calls. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: docker.client.connection-timeout
properties.description: Socket connection timeout for REST API calls. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: docker.client.max-total-connections
properties.description: Maximum number of total connections to be opened to Docker API. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: docker.client.max-per-route-connections
properties.description: Maximum number of total connections to be opened against any given route. More Details : https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/wiki.

properties.name: fake.batch.default-config.job
properties.description: Path to JSON file containing a list of default jobs in the system. Could be a classpath file (ie classpath:/myfile.json), absolute path (ie /home/user/some/path/myfile.json, or relative path to application start director (i.e if application was started from /home/user/ and file is in /home/user/some/path/myfile.json then ./some/path/myfile.json).

properties.name: fake.batch.default-config.job-queue
properties.description: Path to JSON file containing a list of default job queues in the system. Could be a classpath file (ie classpath:/myfile.json), absolute path (ie /home/user/some/path/myfile.json, or relative path to application start director (i.e if application was started from /home/user/ and file is in /home/user/some/path/myfile.json then ./some/path/myfile.json).

properties.name: fake.batch.default-config.job-definition
properties.description: Path to JSON file containing a list of default job definitions in the system. Could be a classpath file (ie classpath:/myfile.json), absolute path (ie /home/user/some/path/myfile.json, or relative path to application start director (i.e if application was started from /home/user/ and file is in /home/user/some/path/myfile.json then ./some/path/myfile.json).

properties.name: fake.batch.default-config.compute-environment
properties.description: Path to JSON file containing a list of default compute environments in the system. Could be a classpath file (ie classpath:/myfile.json), absolute path (ie /home/user/some/path/myfile.json, or relative path to application start director (i.e if application was started from /home/user/ and file is in /home/user/some/path/myfile.json then ./some/path/myfile.json).
